Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Minnesota in 2008...
Had first career hit on 5/15/2009, off Brad Ziegler (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/23/2009, off Runelvys Hernandez (NYN)...
Was selected to the 2011 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2012 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Colorado on 7/22/2012...
Traded from Minnesota to Los Angeles (A) on 2/8/2013 (Going to MIN: RF J. Winker, C M. Perez, 3B K. Vitek, C J. Romero. Going to LAA: 3B P. Sandoval)...
Injured on 4/24/2013 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Baltimore on 6/15/2013...
Was selected to the 2013 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/2014, hitting .542 with 1 HR, 2 RBI...
Was selected to the 2014 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/1/2015, hitting .520 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Injured on 6/20/2015 with a Fractured Jaw, out for 3 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/27/2015, hitting .462 with 3 HR, 4 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Oakland on 6/10/2016...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Florida on 7/21/2016...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2016, hitting .448 with 6 HR, 31 RBI...
Won Most Valuable Player Award in 2016, hitting .359 with 33 HR, 129 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/2017, hitting .615 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2017, hitting .418 with 7 HR, 28 RBI...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/4/2017, hitting .583 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Most Valuable Player Award in 2017, hitting .369 with 29 HR, 123 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (A) on 5/3/2018...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2018, hitting .378 with 6 HR, 27 RBI...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Won Most Valuable Player Award in 2018, hitting .334 with 25 HR, 143 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2019, hitting .388 with 6 HR, 24 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/8/2019, hitting .619 with 2 HR, 14 RBI...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Had 2000th career hit on 7/21/2019, off Navery Moore (SDN)...
Had 27-game hitting streak snapped on 8/13/2019...
Hit 3 homeruns against Detroit, driving in 6 runs on 9/20/2019...
